    void
    atLeastOneSideFreeTest()
    Method atLeastOneSideFreeTest tests if a position in the game board containing a tile has at least one adjacent position which does not contain a tile
    void
    checkForRefillTest()
    Method checkForRefillTest tests if the game board needs to be refilled, it happens when there are not at least two adjacent positions containing a tile
    void

    Method checkPlayerChoiceTest tests if the positions of tiles chosen by the player are valid

    Method getBoardTest tests if getBoard method returns the correct board.

    Method readLivingRoomFromJson tests if the json file is read correctly, if the Matrix is the correct size and if deck is initialized.

  • Method Details

    • readLivingRoomFromJson

      @Test public void readLivingRoomFromJson()
      Method readLivingRoomFromJson tests if the json file is read correctly, if the Matrix is the correct size and if deck is initialized. Then it tests if every cell has the correct state and if the tile is null or not.

    • checkPlayerChoiceTest

      @Test public void checkPlayerChoiceTest()
      Method checkPlayerChoiceTest tests if the positions of tiles chosen by the player are valid

    • atLeastOneSideFreeTest

      @Test public void atLeastOneSideFreeTest()
      Method atLeastOneSideFreeTest tests if a position in the game board containing a tile has at least one adjacent position which does not contain a tile

    • checkForRefillTest

      @Test public void checkForRefillTest()
      Method checkForRefillTest tests if the game board needs to be refilled, it happens when there are not at least two adjacent positions containing a tile

    • refillTest

      @Test public void refillTest()
      Method refillTest tests if refill method correctly refills the board.

    • updateCouplesTest

      @Test public void updateCouplesTest()
      Method updateCouplesTest tests if updateCouples correctly deletes the couples from the board.

    • getBoardTest

      @Test public void getBoardTest()
      Method getBoardTest tests if getBoard method returns the correct board.
